frontend.name: NextJS Portfolio
frontend.description: A responsive portfolio website built with Next.js featuring smooth animations and dark mode
frontend.readme:
# NextJS Portfolio

A modern, responsive portfolio site built with Next.js and Tailwind CSS. Features include dark mode, smooth page transitions, and dynamic content loading.

frontend.name: E-commerce Dashboard
frontend.description: Admin dashboard for e-commerce platform with sales analytics and inventory management
frontend.readme:
# E-commerce Dashboard

A comprehensive admin interface for managing products, orders, and customer data. Includes real-time sales analytics and inventory tracking.

frontend.name: Social Media App
frontend.description: Instagram-inspired social media application with real-time messaging
frontend.readme:
# Social Connect

A full-featured social media application with user authentication, post creation, likes, comments, and real-time chat functionality.

frontend.name: Weather Forecast SPA
frontend.description: Single page application that displays weather forecasts based on location
frontend.readme:
# Weather Forecast App

A Vue.js application that provides current weather conditions and 5-day forecasts. Features location detection and search functionality.

frontend.name: Task Management System
frontend.description: Kanban-style task management application with drag-and-drop interface
frontend.readme:
# Task Management System

A productivity application for organizing tasks in customizable boards and lists. Supports multiple users and project sharing.

backend.name: RESTful API Service
backend.description: Comprehensive REST API for blog content management with authentication
backend.readme:
# Blog CMS API

A secure RESTful API that provides endpoints for creating, reading, updating, and deleting blog posts, with user authentication and authorization.

backend.name: Python FastAPI Backend
backend.description: High-performance API built with FastAPI for data processing and analytics
backend.readme:
# Analytics API

A modern, fast API built with FastAPI framework, providing endpoints for data processing, analytics, and reporting with automatic Swagger documentation.

backend.name: Microservices Architecture
backend.description: Network of microservices for e-commerce platform with API gateway
backend.readme:
# E-commerce Microservices

A collection of interconnected services handling orders, payments, inventory, and user accounts, with service discovery and load balancing.

backend.name: GraphQL Server
backend.description: GraphQL server providing flexible data querying for a music streaming service
backend.readme:
# Music Streaming GraphQL API

A GraphQL server that allows complex queries for artists, albums, tracks, and playlists with efficient data fetching patterns.

backend.name: Real-time Notification Service
backend.description: WebSocket-based service for delivering real-time notifications and updates
backend.readme:
# Real-time Notification Service

A high-performance service built with Go that handles thousands of concurrent WebSocket connections for delivering instant notifications.
